about_the_game:
Of Guards and Thieves - Hunting Grounds is a Free To Play DLC that includes a new set of classes, Sniper for Guards faction and Hunter for Thieves faction, four new weapons, four new gadgets, one new official map called River Village, 10 new unlockable levels and more than 700 new jungle-themed map editor unique objects.

Content List:

  • New Class: Sniper (Guards)
  • New Class: Hunter (Thieves)
  • 2 New Avatars: Sniper and Hunter
  • New unlockable levels (70 to 80)
  • New Weapon: AVP
  • New Weapon: Hunting Rifle
  • New Weapon: Zakarov SD
  • New Weapon: Hunting Knife
  • New Weapon: Barbed Wire
  • New Weapon: Portable Bush
  • New Weapon: Waps Jar
  • New Weapon: Chemlight

New Features

  • Map Editor - Diagonal Building Capability
  • Interactive Vegetation

New Official River Village Map

New Map Editor Content

  • Map Editor NEW Terrain Paintable Textures Set (8 new textures)
  • Map Editor NEW Terrain Paintable Details Set (5 grass types)
  • Map Editor NEW Metal Walls Tileset (96 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Metal Wall Passages Tileset (52 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Metal Barricades Tileset (44 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Jungle Wooden Walls Tileset (70 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Jungle Wooden Furniture Tileset (148 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Jungle Bushes Tileset (60 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Jungle Trees Tileset (104 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Diagonal Roof Tileset (3 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Jungle Leaves Tileset (14 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Underwater Rocks Tileset (116 new unique tiles)
  • Map Editor NEW Item Spawner with new Weapon/Gadgets Tiles (10 new unique tiles)

name: Of Guards and Thieves - Hunting Grounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Of Guards and Thieves - Hunting Grounds includes a 2 new classes, Sniper for Guards faction and Hunter for Thieves faction, four new weapons, four new gadgets, one new official map called River Village, 10 new unlockable levels and more than 700 new jungle-themed map editor unique objects.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Norwegian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
